parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page of results to display, starts from zero

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Number of runs to return per page. Defaults to 10 runs

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: Extra details to display: steps, history

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: An array of sort options. Sortable columns are title, last_run. Format is [{"col1": "ASC"}]

parameters.name: result
parameters.description: Only return tests with a specific result

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Only return tests having all specified tags

parameters.name: site_id
parameters.description: Only return tests for this specific site

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Only return tests matching this string

parameters.name: tests
parameters.description: Only return tests matching this criteria. Can be comma separated list of ids or an array of test ids. Optionally pass 'all' to run all tests in your account.

parameters.name: smart_folder_id
parameters.description: Only return tests matching smart folder criteria

parameters.name: site_id
parameters.description: The ID of the site this test is for.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The title of your test

parameters.name: start_uri
parameters.description: Where the test should start from; e.g. /login. Must start with a /

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Optional text description of the test

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: Extra details to display: steps

parameters.name: run_mode
parameters.description: Either 'default' or 'sequential'. Defines if this test can be run in parallel.

operations.summary: Creates a copy of the test

parameters.name: test_id
parameters.description: A test ID
